revision.text:
In '''shops''', various currencies can be exchanged for useful items such as [[Evolution Items]], [[Eggs]], and [[Pokéballs]]. The prices shown in the tables below reflect the base prices of each item. When bought in bulk, items increase in price by various amounts. With the exception of Masterballs and [[Protein]], shop items can be decreased by defeating route Pokémon. [[Key Items]], [[Oak Item|Oak Items]], and [[Farm Hand|Farm Hands]] are bolded and can only be bought once. ==[[Kanto]]: Locations and items== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! City Name !!  {{Questpoints}} 1,000 || - || - || - || - || - |- |} ==Poké Mart== A Department Store can be found in every region and are located in [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto|Celadon City]], [[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto|Goldenrod City]], [[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn|LilyCove City]], [[Towns_%26_Cities#Sinnoh|Veilstone City]], [[Towns_%26_Cities#Unova|Shopping Mall Nine]], and [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kalos|Lumiose City]]. The [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto|Celadon City]] Department Store does not stock [[File:Ultraball.png|25px]][[Ultraball|Ultraballs]], [[File:SmallRestore.png|25px]][[Small Restore|Small Restores]], [[File:MediumRestore.png|25px]][[Medium Restore|Medium Restores]], or [[File:LargeRestore.png|25px]][[Large Restore|Large Restores]], and the [[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto|Goldenrod City]] Department Store also does not stock [[File:LargeRestore.png|25px]][[Large Restore|Large Restores]]. This store can be accessed in the Shortcuts module alongside the [[Underground]] and [[Farm]] after defeating Champion Lance in Johto. {| class="wikitable" |- | [[File:Ball_Pokeball.png|30px]][[Pokeball|Pokéball]]

revision.text:
In '''shops''', various currencies can be exchanged for useful items such as [[Evolution Items]], [[Eggs]], and [[Pokéballs]]. The prices shown in the tables below reflect the base prices of each item. When bought in bulk, items increase in price by various amounts. With the exception of Masterballs and [[Protein]], shop items can be decreased by defeating route Pokémon. [[Key Items]], [[Oak Item|Oak Items]], and [[Farm Hand|Farm Hands]] are bolded and can only be bought once. ==[[Kanto]]: Locations and items== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! City Name !! The prices shown in the tables below reflect the base prices of each item. When bought in bulk, items increase in price by various amounts. With the exception of Masterballs and [[Protein]], shop items can be decreased by defeating route Pokémon.
